com.csahmad.moodcloud

Class LocalData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csahmad.moodcloud.LocalData

  • public class LocalData
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by oahmad on 2017-03-01. Stores an Account and Posts for the current user
